title: Our first date - 43 years ago today!
review: I was 16.She was 15 going on 16. ;) It was April 7, 1965 - our first date.We were at the first run of the 'Sound of Music' at the King's Theatre in Winnipeg, Canada.I had been asking her out for months and she had finally succumbed! During the intermission, I told her I intended to marry her.She laughed.That was 43 years ago today.We got married during Woodstock and have remained married for 39 years! :)
